entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,3,1,1}{F813,0,115004}You men won't be dispatched so easily{F801}this time, I hope...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,115008}Th-That's unfortunate, but we'll{F801}abide by your opinion.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons is awaiting...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,115009}Wh-What should we do? Ah... I presume{F801}we must fight them?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,115009}Wh-What should we do? Ah... I presume{F801}we must fight them?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,115010}Don't expect us to act the lovestruck{F801}buffoons over you twice!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,115010}Don't expect us to act the lovestruck{F801}buffoons over you twice!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,115011}If those demon girls are here, then{F801}could she be far behind...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,115011}If those demon girls are here, then{F801}could she be far behind...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,115012}Yes... the Black Samurai may very{F801}likely be near...{F801}
